page.title: 08FARMING
page.content: {HOME FARM:A SMALL FAMILY FARM ______________________________ {Home Farm}is asmall family farm of 126 acres run by Bernard Webb and his son Robin. All the fields are grass 46 acres to silage,79 for grazing and an acre for hay. Mr Webb aims to take two crops of silage a year. Farm machinery is limited to a tractor with cutting , soil-feeding equipment such as a muckspreader and hay baler. Mr Webb and his son live in modern houses on the farm. The old,brick farm house is unoccupied but is subject to a preservation order. There are to two sheds for livestock and one for machinery.
